title: Kale and kohlrabi kimchi with pulled pork
description: Kimchi is a Korean dish of fermented cabbage with both spicy and sour flavours. Try it with a pulled pork sandwich or as a side with other Korean dishes.
ingredients: 2-3cm/1in piece fresh root ginger, finely chopped
4 tbsp rice flour (alternatively use spelt or plain flour)
4 tbsp Korean chilli powder, or 2 tbsp cayenne pepper
1 small kohlrabi (about 250g/9oz), peeled and cut into 5mm/¼in matchsticks
raw kale with sesame seeds and honey (from above)
500g/1lb 2oz leftover pulled pork or shredded belly pork
1 loaf sourdough bread, cut into thick slices
1 whole bulb of garlic, cut in half
